channel.title: CMEcorner2go: Why, When, and How to Initiate Insulin Therapy in Elderly Patients with Type 2 Diabetes: A Case-based Approach
channel.itunes:author: CMEcorner.com
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to CMEcorner2go, an educational service of CME Corner (CMEcorner.com). Earn CE (continuing education) credit by participating in this FREE audio podcast titled “Why, When, and How to Initiate Insulin Therapy in Elderly Patients with Type 2 Diabetes: A Case-based Approach.” This program provides continuing education credit for pharmacists and nurses. CME Corner is dedicated to providing quality medical education for health care professionals. To view our full selection of CME and CE programs and podcasts, please visit us online at www.CMEcorner.com.

item.title: MP3: Why, When, and How to Initiate Insulin Therapy in Elderly Patients with Type 2 Diabetes: A Case-based Approach

item.description: This CME/CE activity is provided free of charge. Play this MP3 file in your selected Media Player. Please view the accompanying PDF workbook for credit details.
